context_bundle.summary: HashiCorp Vault for secrets management, encryption as a service, dynamic secrets generation, and secrets rotation with audit logging

onboarding.quick_start: Initialize Vault server, unseal with keys, enable secrets engines (kv, pki, database), write secrets with vault kv put, read with vault kv get, rotate regularly.
common_patterns: KV secrets engine: Store static key-value secrets
Dynamic secrets: Generate temporary database credentials on-demand
PKI engine: Issue and manage X.509 certificates
Transit engine: Encryption as a service without exposing keys
Policies: Define RBAC with path-based access control
Audit logging: Track all Vault operations for compliance
known_errors: Vault must be unsealed after restart using threshold of unseal keys
Tokens expire: Use token renewal or auth methods with long-lived tokens
Seal keys: Store securely (offline, split among keyholders)
High availability: Use Vault clusters for production reliability
